FuncDef: The reset loop-detect traffic-suppression command resets traffic suppression of MAC flapping-based loop detection.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a virtual switching instance (VSI).
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters.

Specifies a VLAN ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After loops are removed from a network and network traffic recovers, run the reset loop-detect traffic-suppression command to reset traffic suppression of MAC flapping-based loop detection.
